mapper.insert: insert ignore into score_table( stu_id,stu_name, month_one, month_two,month_three, week_one,week_two,week_three, week_four,week_five,week_six, week_seven,week_eight ) values( #{stuId},#{stuName}, #{monthOne},#{monthTwo},#{monthThree}, #{weekOne},#{weekTwo},#{weekThree}, #{weekFour},#{weekFive},#{weekSix}, #{weekSeven},#{weekEight} )
mapper.select:
SELECT score_id,s.stu_name stu_name, month_one,dense_rank() over(ORDER BY month_one DESC) row_m1, month_two,dense_rank() over(ORDER BY month_two DESC) row_m2, month_three,dense_rank() over(ORDER BY month_three DESC) row_m3 , week_one,dense_rank() over(ORDER BY week_one DESC) row_w1, week_two,dense_rank() over(ORDER BY week_two DESC) row_w2, week_three,dense_rank() over(ORDER BY week_three DESC) row_w3, week_four,dense_rank() over(ORDER BY week_four DESC) row_w4, week_five,dense_rank() over(ORDER BY week_five DESC) row_w5, week_six,dense_rank() over(ORDER BY week_six DESC) row_w6, week_seven,dense_rank() over(ORDER BY week_seven DESC) row_w7, week_eight,dense_rank() over(ORDER BY week_eight DESC) row_w8, other_score_one,dense_rank() over(ORDER BY other_score_one DESC) rowOther1, month_one+month_two+month_three+week_one+week_two+week_three+week_four+week_five+week_six++week_seven+week_eight sum_score, left(b.stu_class,3) direction,b.class_room class_room,b.stu_class stu_class
ORDER BY sum_score DESC limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(c.stu_id) row_count FROM score_table st LEFT JOIN ( select s.stu_id,s.stu_name stu_name,left(b.stu_class,3) direction,b.class_room class_room,b.stu_class stu_class
) c ON st.stu_id=c.stu_id
mapper.sql:
FROM score_table s LEFT JOIN stu_base_info b ON s.stu_id=b.stu_id
HAVING
direction in
#{data}
and
class_room=#{classRoomNum}
and
stu_name like concat(concat('%',#{stuName},'%'))
and
stu_class like concat(concat('%',#{stuClass},'%'))
mapper.select: SELECT left(stu_class,3) FROM stu_base_info GROUP BY left(stu_class,3)
